description:
1st Vongola Generation Rain Guardian
The First Rain Guardian Asari Ugetsu, was Japanese, and loved music. It was said that there were none who could match his skills with the blade. He physically resembled Yamamoto, and Reborn compared Yamamoto giving up baseball to the first Rain Guardian giving up music: both did so to excel at swordsmanship for the sake of their friends in the Vongola Family. Specifically, the First Rain Guardian sold his instruments for a trio of short swords and a single long sword. Yamamoto`s Kojirou can Cambio Forma into a similar sword, called Asari Ugetsu.
name: Asari Ugetsu
